Blog.post: It's past midnight, I wanders on the Net while I'm listening Zero 7 , this music is pleasant and calming. I think of going to sleep soon. Fortunality, I don't work tomorrow, I can get up later.
Tonight I'm listening to Evanescence while I surf the Net. It's more exactly a live at Astoria (London) . Songs are live versions of the album Fallen.

I have nearly finish my period of work experience at Ifremer Brest . I work on a web site about documents published by the department. My collegue M.O. helps me to test this site. It's little bit bloody because there are some bugs in PHP scripts.

I'm listening to " My bloody Valentine ", I don't know what album is it but it is an incredible one. I will see that now on my jukebox. The name of this album is " Loveless " and is a fucking good one.

A south-east wind is blowing this afternoon : the weather is good to take my board. This evening, I will help Erwann to buy a laptop and wifi accessories to make a LAN for his job. then I will running with Christophe and J.M. to prepare for a adventure raid in September. Yesterday evening, I didn't see My neighboor Totoro , I chose to see Rush Hour 2 . I think it is not a good Jacky Chan movie, dialogues are worth and fights are not so beautiful but the spanish federal agent is very cute.

I saw a lot of movies these previous weeks : K-PAX : a pleasant movie about an ET who comes on earth to have act of generosity done around him, A.I. : an interesting movie where human beings and robots live together, it's hard to make the difference between The two bodies, Finding Forrester : a black man enters in a world which is different from his world but an old writer will help him to realize their dreams, and finally "Laputa : castle in the sky " is an anime movie produced by Hayao Miyazaki : very beautiful and touching. Tonight, I think I will see another anime movie : My neighboor Totoro. Blog later.

I work very hard today. I don't surf the net a lot and I see my collegue M.O. to test my work on the web site. Steven is seing me writing a post on my blog while he is working on GIS (Geographical Information Systems). Apparently I is very interested by this job. The sky is blue and the sun is shining. I don't really know if the wind is blowing. Maybe I will take my board this evening...
The sky is blue with some white and grey clouds. Maybe the wind is blowing...

This great marine party finishes today, ships go to Douarnenez. I go the self-service restaurant of Ifremer to see them. It was quite beautiful : large view, ships under sail but cloudy sky. The next party will take place in 2008.

I'm working on my computer and I see a man who is mowing the lawn. His job can be very interesting. My friend Ronan is talking about something useless with the boss. I'm seing the cloudy sky and I think it's nearly the holidays.
Cool, It's 4 pm and I leave the work !!
It's hard to work everyday and to make something which is not very useful but the working day is nearly finish. Go to home :)
mon premier post en tant que blogger
It's raining now. This morning, I rode my bike at Landeda. I covered 40 kilometers, it was good.

It's past midnight, I think I will go to sleep soon but before I will read a little " Globalia ". I'am listening a mix of Paul Oakenfold, I don't know the name of the album but it's very calming. Tomorrow, it's my mother's birthday, the photo album is nearly finished. I'm in holydays until the 13th september. I still have a month to do nothing, it's pleasant. I will brush my teeth, see you later...
I'm listening to Daredevil soundtrack and particularly to one of Evanescence song : My immortal .

I 've just finished to see a beautiful and moving movie : Lost in Translation . The actors are excellent and the soundtrack is ashtoning. it's good to see this kind of movies compared to crappy US action movies I saw lately.

Hello blog, it's so longer I don't post. I am in holidays since one week and it's cooool. I made funboard this afternoon, it was very pleasant but enough tiring to sleep as a baby this night. This evening, maybe I will see Lost in translation . We'll see if I don't too tired.
